experience.title: Innovation Management System (IMS)
highlights: Advanced idea tracking and management system. Goal set out to be a better WHMCS built for deploying websites and applications for ideas. A website that allows user's to create websites using no code.

As a full stack developer I was able to get the application running in a SaaS enviornment, setup member authentication, programmed business logic, and coded many forms, lists, and master-detail pages.

Project failed because of lack of marketing, mental health reasons, and then finally lack of overall interest; MVP was not reached mostly because my focus shifted to working on a new programming language and ERP.
Note: sense then things have been gutted and repurposed into a client area for subvind members because I like the domain name.
